description:
A lightweight alternative to slathering yourself in sunscreen. The UV-protective fabric have you covered on sun-baked routes, and the wicking and cooling properties offer respite on hot cragging days.

  • Lightweight and stretchy blend of polyester and spandex has UPF 50+ sun protection
  • BD.Cool™ cooling technology reflects near-infrared rays to help reduce your body temperature
  • Polygiene® antimicrobial treatment resists odours
  • Underarm gusset for unrestricted range of motion
name: Black Diamond Alpenglow Long Sleeve Crew - Men's
